name: AwesomeFacts
0:
”Alexa, open awesome fact”
”tell me an awesome fact”
”an awesome fact”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: awesome fact
des:
Using this skill, you just have to say "Alexa, tell me an awesome fact" and Alexa will tell you a random fact that will amaze you. 

Some example of these facts :-
"Madame Curie's notebooks are still radioactive. Researchers wishing to study them must sign a waiver in order to do so.",
"Caterpillars completely liquify as they transform into moths.", 
"There are over 200 corpses on Mount Everest and they are used as way points for climbers.",
"All of the clocks in the movie 'Pulp Fiction' are stuck at 4:20."
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
